documentation.text:
@dev returns all information about the grant's vesting as of the given day
 for the given account. Only callable by the account holder or a contract owner.
 @param grantHolder = The address to do this for.
 @param onDayOrToday = The day to check for, in days since the UNIX epoch. Can pass
   the special value 0 to indicate today.
 return = A tuple with the following values:
   amountVested = the amount that is already vested
   amountNotVested = the amount that is not yet vested (equal to vestingAmount - vestedAmount)
   amountOfGrant = the total amount of tokens subject to vesting.
   amountAvailable = the amount of funds in the given account which are available for use as of the given day
   amountClaimed = out of amountVested, the amount that has been already transferred to beneficiary
   vestStartDay = starting day of the grant (in days since the UNIX epoch).
   isActive = true if the vesting schedule is currently active.
   wasRevoked = true if the vesting schedule was revoked.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "new claimed amount must be <= total grant amount"

attributes.value: new claimed amount must be <= total grant amount

attributes.text:
@dev returns all information about the grant's vesting as of the given day
 for the given account. Only callable by the account holder or a contract owner.
 @param grantHolder = The address to do this for.
 @param onDayOrToday = The day to check for, in days since the UNIX epoch. Can pass
   the special value 0 to indicate today.
 return = A tuple with the following values:
   amountVested = the amount that is already vested
   amountNotVested = the amount that is not yet vested (equal to vestingAmount - vestedAmount)
   amountOfGrant = the total amount of tokens subject to vesting.
   amountAvailable = the amount of funds in the given account which are available for use as of the given day
   amountClaimed = out of amountVested, the amount that has been already transferred to beneficiary
   vestStartDay = starting day of the grant (in days since the UNIX epoch).
   isActive = true if the vesting schedule is currently active.
   wasRevoked = true if the vesting schedule was revoked.

attributes.type: function (struct TokenVestingInterface.tokenGrant storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

devdoc.details: Contract which gives the ability to act as a pool of funds for allocating   tokens to any number of other addresses. Token grants support the ability to vest over time in   accordance a predefined vesting schedule. A given wallet can receive no more than one token grant.

addGrant(address,uint256,uint32,uint32,u.details: Grants tokens to an address, including a portion that will vest over time according to a set vesting schedule. The overall duration and cliff duration of the grant must be an even multiple of the vesting interval.

params.beneficiary: = Address to which tokens will be granted.
params.cliffDuration: = Duration of the cliff, with respect to the grant start day, in days.
params.duration: = Duration of the vesting schedule, with respect to the grant start day, in days.
params.interval: = Number of days between vesting increases.
params.isRevocable: = True if the grant can be revoked (i.e. was a gift) or false if it cannot   be revoked (i.e. tokens were purchased).
params.startDay: = Start day of the grant's vesting schedule, in days since the UNIX epoch   (start of day). The startDay may be given as a date in the future or in the past, going as far   back as year 2000.
params.vestingAmount: = The number of tokens subject to vesting.

getGrantInfo(address,uint32).details: returns all information about the grant's vesting as of the given day for the given account. Only callable by the account holder or a contract owner.

params.grantHolder: = The address to do this for.
params.onDayOrToday: = The day to check for, in days since the UNIX epoch. Can pass   the special value 0 to indicate today. return = A tuple with the following values:   amountVested = the amount that is already vested   amountNotVested = the amount that is not yet vested (equal to vestingAmount - vestedAmount)   amountOfGrant = the total amount of tokens subject to vesting.   amountAvailable = the amount of funds in the given account which are available for use as of the given day   amountClaimed = out of amountVested, the amount that has been already transferred to beneficiary   vestStartDay = starting day of the grant (in days since the UNIX epoch).   isActive = true if the vesting schedule is currently active.   wasRevoked = true if the vesting schedule was revoked.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeGrant(address).details: If the account has a revocable grant, this forces the grant to end immediately. After this function is called, getGrantInfo will return incomplete data and there will be no possibility to claim non-claimed tokens

params.grantHolder: = Address to which tokens will be granted.

setVestingSchedule(address,uint32,uint32.details: This one-time operation permanently establishes a vesting schedule in the given account.

params.cliffDuration: = Duration of the cliff, with respect to the grant start day, in days.
params.duration: = Duration of the vesting schedule, with respect to the grant start day, in days.
params.interval: = Number of days between vesting increases.
params.isRevocable: = True if the grant can be revoked (i.e. was a gift) or false if it cannot   be revoked (i.e. tokens were purchased).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract for token vesting schedules
